text: @ShehuSani I do not understand the fixation on seeing COVID-19 patients. Because of stigmatisation in Nigeria, most patients will not want to be videoed or have pictures taken. How many times have you seen Atiku's son's picture? Yet it is public knowledge that he contracted the virus. Pls
